about_page.title: About DevPas
about_page.subtitle: We are a passionate community dedicated to helping aspiring developers take their first, most crucial steps into the world of technology.
about_page.mission_description: To build a supportive and inclusive ecosystem where beginners can learn practical skills, connect with peers and mentors, and confidently launch their careers in the tech industry. We aim to break down barriers and make technology education accessible to everyone, everywhere.
about_page.value_empowerment_description: We provide the tools and knowledge for anyone to start their journey in technology, fostering growth and confidence.
about_page.value_community_description: We believe in the power of collaboration. Our platform is a space for learning, sharing, and growing together.
about_page.value_accessibility_description: High-quality tech education should be accessible to all, regardless of background or experience.
about_page.join_journey_subtitle: Become a part of our growing community and start your tech journey today.

courses_page.title: Our Courses
